alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 21 at 5:24PM CDT until March 21 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Caldwell County in south central Texas... Guadalupe County in south central Texas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near New Berlin, or near Seguin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and hail up to two inches in diameter. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, San Marcos, Seguin, Cibolo, Luling, McQueeney, Martindale, Marion, Kingsbury, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Staples, Fentress, Geronimo, Zorn, Nolte, Zipp, Redwood and New Braunfels National Airport. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
